summary: An ordinance providing for the location of undertaking establishments, morgues, public, community or association mausoleums, and crematories, for the disposition of the bodies of the dead within certain districts and localities within the City of Seattle, and prohibiting the construction and maintenance of such institutions outside of such certain districts, providing penalties for violation thereof, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 27580, approved July 11, 1911 and 27783, approved August 21, 1911, and 29673, approved July 9, 1912.
